## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `testMode` | `test-mode` | If true, this will display dummy data instead of fetching from the GitHub API | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `username` | `username`  | The username of the GitHub profile you want to display                        | `string`  | `undefined` |
